values: To quit something means to stop doing it.
I quit running because I got tired.

退出, 辞职, 辞掉, 放弃 (verb.)
停止； 放弃； 离开； 辞
To quit is to stop or give up something, often a job or activity, or to leave or abandon something.
Quit means to stop doing or using something, often voluntarily and permanently.
